thread.section_title: Kimpton Muse Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great find
thread.title_full: Great find - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: traveljacks85
title: Great find
text: We stayed here for one night right before Christmas time. Hotel is beautiful and clean, rooms were small (nyc small) but very comfortable. The bathroom was modern and very clean. The lobby had a free hot chocolate bar which i loved with multiple fixings. That was a plus. Kind staff and great location. Would definitely return.
